articles.description: Ah, sleep. That restorative eight hours that you may or may not be getting every night actively combats stress while keeping you healthy, alert, and strengthening your immune system. This is why there are so many gummies, salves, potions and other…

articles.author: James Gorman
articles.title: Mink and the Coronavirus: What We Know - The New York Times
articles.description: Mink are the only animal known to both catch the virus from people and transmit it to them.
articles.content:
Last week, Denmark announced its intention to cull all farmed mink, some 17 million, out of fear that a mutated version of the coronavirus might diminish the effectiveness of potential vaccines.
